divs: sighting detailsi was outside playing for a while as i hear a loud buzzing and vibration. as i look up i see a triangular object overhead and it was a grey\black color and looked very unusual compared to human built objects. i though it may be a military shuttle or something, but it was very unusual, it dashed overhead then stopped hovering for about 5 minutes but as the helicopters showed up it started to leave and at lightning speed dashed off leaving a trail of what i thought may be smoke. after i saw it i fell alittle woosy and got a minor headache but it vanished quickly. i lost contact as soon as it flew off.
Summary: Medium size triangular shuttle flew overhead and sat still for about 5 min. Then took off and while it was a few copters showed up.
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Santa Clarita
There were no other sightings in Santa Clarita on or around February 22nd 2012
